id.label: ID
id.description: Define a unique identifier for the element.

cls.label: Class
cls.description: Define one or more class names for the element. Separate multiple classes with spaces.

name.label: Name
name.description: Define a name to easily identify this element inside the builder.

status.label: Status
status.description: Disable your element and publish it later. It will only be shown to the editor while the customizer is open.

animation.label: Animation
animation.description: Override the section's animation setting. This option won't have any effect unless animations are enabled for this section.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.description: Display the element only on this device width and larger.

container_padding_remove.label: Section/Row
container_padding_remove.description: If a section or row has a max width, and one side is expanding to the left or right, the default padding can be removed from the expanding side.

margin.label: Margin
margin.description: Set the vertical margin. Note: The first element's top margin and the last element's bottom margin are always removed. Define those in the grid settings instead.

maxwidth_align.label: Max Width Alignment
maxwidth_align.description: Define the alignment in case the container exceeds the element's max-width.

maxwidth_breakpoint.label: Max Width Breakpoint
maxwidth_breakpoint.description: Define the device width from which the element's max-width will apply.

text_align.label: Text Alignment
text_align.description: Center, left and right alignment may depend on a breakpoint and require a fallback.

text_align_justify.label: Text Alignment
text_align_justify.description: Center, left and right alignment may depend on a breakpoint and require a fallback.

text_align_breakpoint.label: Text Alignment Breakpoint
text_align_breakpoint.description: Define the device width from which the alignment will apply.

text_align_fallback.label: Text Alignment Fallback
text_align_fallback.description: Define an alignment fallback for device widths below the breakpoint.

text_align_justify_fallback.label: Text Alignment Fallback
text_align_justify_fallback.description: Define an alignment fallback for device widths below the breakpoint.

link.label: Link
link.description: Enter or pick a link, an image or a video file.

link_target.text: Open the link in a new window

link_title.label: Link Title
link_title.description: Enter an optional text for the title attribute of the link, which will appear on hover.

icon_ratio.label: Icon Size
icon_ratio.description: Enter a size ratio, if you want the icon to appear larger than the default font size, for example 1.5 or 2 to double the size.
